3.name: Adventurer
3.text: "Hey, it's serious! We need some help!!"

5.name: Adventurer
5.text:
"This person was collapsed in front of the
village...! They're seriously injured, can someone
please take a look at them?"

8.name: Ma-kun
8.text:
"An elf... Not an adventurer. Must be from the
nearby forest tribe."

9.name: Erick
9.text:
"So... what happened? Those wounds... look pretty
severe..."

10.name: Elf
10.text:
"I'm sorry... please help us...! A green dragon
has appeared in our forest..."

12.name: Elf
12.text:
"Our tribe fought back... but we couldn't match
him. Most of our people were either eaten or toyed
with, suffering and tormenting..."

13.name: Elf
13.text:
"At this rate, the forest will be completely
defiled by that creature. I apologize... for
seeking help from the people of the plains..."

16.name: Adventurer
16.text: "The green dragon is a dangerous one..."

17.name: Adventurer
17.text:
"But if we leave it alone, there will be more
victims..."

19.name: Sol
19.text:
"I'll do it!! I won't let the green dragon get
away with this!"

20.name: Erick
20.text:
"Sol-chan, are you not showing a lot of
hostility?"

21.name: Isk
21.text:
"There's no other choice... For us metallic
dragons, the colored dragons are our sworn
enemies. Not only can we not tolerate their
existence, but to hear of such atrocities... As a
golden dragon born with the instinct to defeat
evil..."

22.name: Erick
22.text:
"Ah, I see... I forgot because she's usually so
laid-back, but this child is a golden dragon,
isn't she?"

23.name: Isk
23.text:
"Yes... I tend to forget, but she is a golden
dragon... She may resemble a puppy, but she is not
a puppy..."

26.name: Ma-kun
26.text:
"But our opponent is a dragon, and not just any
dragon, but one that wiped out an entire tribe of
elves. Don't let your guard down. Be fully
prepared."

31.text: Scene: Battle with the Green Dragon

33.name: Narration
33.text:
The forest trembles, the trees sway in the fierce
wind, and leaves scatter. The master of this
forest, the green dragon, descends with flapping
wings.

34.name: Narration
34.text:
The dragon with emerald scales lets out a sneering
sound that resembles a growl, "Gugugu..."

36.name: Green Dragon
36.text:
"Oh, so the clever elves have some scheme in
mind... To rely on such a pitiful creature. How
pathetic!"

39.name: Green Dragon
39.text:
"Is that little one over there a golden dragon?
Hahaha, it's beyond pitiful, it's ridiculous! A
golden chick still with its shell on dares to
oppose me!! Hahahahaha!!"

40.name: Green Dragon
40.text:
"Very well! I won't kill you easily! I will make
you suffer and show all the forest dwellers how
you cry and scream in pain! I look forward to
seeing the faces of the elves when they hear your
pitiful pleas for mercy!"

41.name: Sol
41.text:
"I absolutely won't allow such a thing! I will
take back the forest of the elves!!"

44.name: Narration
44.text:
The roar of a great beast shakes the forest. The
shadows of two dragons intertwine, making a
thunderous noise as they fall to the ground.

45.name: Narration
45.text:
The dust settles, and the silhouette becomes
clear. What appeared was the figure of a golden
dragon, perched on top of the massive green body,
aiming to deliver the finishing blow.

47.name: Narration
47.text:
In the moment when the Green Dragon opened its
jaws wide for a final struggle and exhaled
poisonous gas... the sharp fangs of the golden
dragon tore off its head.

48.name: Narration
48.text:
Unable to even exhale its breath, the green dragon
spews blood. Its body, now headless, convulses
violently, but soon comes to a stop.

49.name: Narration
49.text:
As if announcing the death of the forest's master,
the birds flew away from the trees.
